About me

Let me tell you few things...

I'm a product designer based in sunny Sydney, Australia. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive designs. When I'm not coding, tweeting or pushing pixels, you'll find me cooking, gardening or working out in the park.
